function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased volume of calls to L\\u00ednea 100 after March 2020","Impact":"Risk of overload on the helpline system and staff, potential delay in responding to urgent calls","Mitigation":"Implement additional staffing and resources to handle the increased call volume, optimize helpline processes to handle higher demand","Technologies":"Call center management software, automated response systems, data analytics for call volume prediction","People":"Staff at L\\u00ednea 100, callers in need of urgent assistance","Owner":"Management of L\\u00ednea 100, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Variation in effect by month post-March 2020","Impact":"Inconsistent response to calls based on the month, potential negative impact on the effectiveness of the helpline","Mitigation":"Monitor and analyze call data by month to identify patterns and adjust response strategies accordingly","Technologies":"Data analytics, call tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Staff at L\\u00ednea 100, callers in need of urgent assistance","Owner":"Management of L\\u00ednea 100, public health authorities"}]}
